snippet: Though anxious, thousands of people went to the park over the weekend, just days after the authorities announced that a third person had died from hantavirus.
abstract: Tourists continue to visit Yosemite National Park, despite an announcement from authorities that a third person had died of the rodent-borne hantavirus, which has forced the park to close 91 cabins in the park's most popular area.
lead_paragraph: Though anxious, thousands of people went to the park over the weekend, just days after the authorities announced that a third person had died from hantavirus.

headline.seo: Despite Virus, Visitors Trek to Yosemite, if a Bit Warily
headline.main: Despite Virus, Visitors Trek to Yosemite, if a Bit Warily
headline.print_headline: Despite Virus, Visitors Trek To Yosemite, If a Bit Warily
